Text:
This is awesome quality, THANKS
Can we PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE have the other episodes that have aired.  I have not been able to find any that compare with your Ski Sundays.  I'm sure that I'm not the only one that wants more of this excellent show.  Pure Thanks!

You are right, not the only one who wants more of this show and this quality.

Please upload more episodes, excellent work.

I just register to write this comment.
